title: E312 Mike Posner Explains Why He Took A Pill In Ibiza
itunes:title: Mike Posner Explains Why He Took A Pill In Ibiza
description:
Multi-platinum artist, Mike Posner, joins the boys to discuss the story behind his famous songs ‘I Took A Pill In Ibiza’ & ‘Cooler Than Me’, escaping death while climbing Mount Everest, the 21-day retreat that changed his life forever, being labeled a “one-hit wonder”, walking across America, getting suspended for getting his a** kicked & more…
